ComicInfo.Summary:
Every year, a group of six people gather for Christmas in a cabin in the far North Woods of Wisconsin. But this isn't your average bickering nuclear family-these are six of the most prolific killers in North America.
Now, last year's sins have risen from the grave, ready to deliver the gift of revenge. Guided by the Crow, Cecilia Rite will give six psychos a holiday hammer party.
*Story Recap* Brandi is hunting with her father just before Christmas, then after killing a deer Brandi and her father go to the local bar where Brandi's father accidentally insults Larry. Later Larry kidnaps Brandi and her father, and the rest of Larry's group discover what he did. They decide the only thing to do is to kill them and dump their bodies in the frozen lake.
One Year later, the group return to the small town to celebrate Christmas. This time when Jinko dresses up like Santa, Crow Brandi, kills him and leaves his body for the others to find. Crow Brandi then kills the rest of the group who turn out to be high class assassins.
Crow Brandi kills everyone but when it comes to Ms. White who tells her that she deserves to die for killing Brandi and her father, but begs her to forgive her. This causes the Crow to caw and Crow Brandi leaves her with her thoughts and her forgiveness.

ComicInfo.Title: Hark the Herald
